md:
giải nghĩa từ "according" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

1. According to (phó từ)
	* Meaning: Theo như, dựa trên
	* Example: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.
	* Related words: as per, as stated in, in accordance with
	* Antonyms: contrary to, despite, in spite of

2. According (phó từ)
	* Meaning: Theo như, phù hợp với
	* Example: The new policy is according to the company's values.
	* Related words: in line with, consistent with, in conformity with
	* Antonyms: contrary to, inconsistent with, at odds with

3. According as (phó từ)
	* Meaning: Theo như, tùy theo
	* Example: According as you need, we can provide more resources.
	* Related words: depending on, as per, in proportion to
	* Antonyms: regardless of, despite, in spite of

Note: The meanings of "according" can vary depending on the context and the words it is used with.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "according" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  1. According to (phó từ)

    • Meaning: Theo như, dựa trên
    • Example: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.
    • Related words: as per, as stated in, in accordance with
    • Antonyms: contrary to, despite, in spite of

  2. According (phó từ)

    • Meaning: Theo như, phù hợp với
    • Example: The new policy is according to the company's values.
    • Related words: in line with, consistent with, in conformity with
    • Antonyms: contrary to, inconsistent with, at odds with

  3. According as (phó từ)

    • Meaning: Theo như, tùy theo
    • Example: According as you need, we can provide more resources.
    • Related words: depending on, as per, in proportion to
    • Antonyms: regardless of, despite, in spite of

Note: The meanings of "according" can vary depending on the context and the words it is used with.
